name: 2 dudes and a suit (demo v0.12) (2DAAS)
description:
Greetings welcome to our itch.io page for our upcoming project "2 dudes and a suit," it's a physics-based brawler fps thing. This game has a unique limb-based combat system where you can dismantle your enemies (yes your fighting robots.) 

Once finishing the demo you can send some feedback through the form button and have you influence over the path/development of the game.

Plot: The year is (sometime in the future) you break into a were house for a graphics card that got lost in delivery. That's all you get for now.

Get updates on our website here: https://milanm2121.wixsite.com/fist-face-studios/blog

Donate if you want, money will either help pay rent or be used for assets... mostly assets.
